title: Hilary Swank on Netflix's sci-fi Away and the ultimate work-life dilemma
description: Hilary Swank talks about her role for Netflix as the commander on the first manned mission to Mars.

title: Europe's migrant crisis: The year that changed a continent
description: More than a million people arrived in Europe in 2015. Five years on, we reflect on what's changed.

title: Mauritius oil spill: 'We want to protect our island'
description: Young locals are helping to prevent environmental damage after an oil leak from a ship that ran aground.

title: 'We need Eat Out To Help Out to run in the autumn'
description: A group of restaurateurs wants the Eat Out To Help Out scheme to be brought back in the autumn.

title: Sheffield United: Who wrote club anthem Greasy Chip Butty?
description: John Denver's 1974 hit Annie's Song has been the tune of Sheffield United's anthem for decades. Why?

title: The search engine boss who wants to help us all plant trees
description: Christian Kroll is the boss of Ecosia, which donates 80% of its profits to tree-planting projects.

title: Coronavirus: From fitness training to feeding people
description: Gym owner Mike Hind and his team have been delivering care packages to vulnerable people.

title: Going for a Lake District walk with Max the Miracle Dog
description: Kerry Irving and his three dogs have become an internet sensation, so the BBC joined them for a walk.

title: England v Pakistan: Eoin Morgan highlights from T20 victory at Old Trafford
description: Watch the best of Eoin Morgan's masterful innings as the England captain makes 66 to help England chase 196 and beat Pakistan by five wickets

title: Chadwick Boseman: Black Panther director Ryan Coogler pays emotional tribute
description: "The ancestors spoke through him," says Ryan Coogler in a long and loving tribute to the star.

title: Girl thrown into air by kite in Taiwan
description: The three-year-old escaped with minor injuries after being lifted into the air by a gust of wind.

title: Woman arrested for naked video on India's Lakshman Jhula bridge
description: The woman faces charges under India's internet law over the incident on the Lakshman Jhula bridge.

title: Coronavirus: University return 'could spark Covid avalanche'
description: Lecturers say cases may soar as students move in, but ministers insist institutions are prepared.

title: Moss Bros considering closing stores in rescue deal
description: The suit maker has been hit by Covid-19 restrictions on events such as Royal Ascot and large weddings.

title: Belarus: Heavy security for anti-Lukashenko rally in Minsk
description: Riot police cordon off the main square in the centre of Minsk as columns of people march towards it.

title: Glastonbury 2021 'aims to be back in June', Emily Eavis says
description: Festival co-organiser Emily Eavis says it will not move from its traditional slot.

title: Germany coronavirus: Anger after attempt to storm parliament
description: Far-right activists broke away from a large protest in Berlin against coronavirus restrictions.

title: Portland clashes: Fatal shooting as rival groups protest
description: A pro-Trump procession was met by counter-protesters in another tense night in the Oregon city.

title: Coronavirus: 'Music is just an instinct to me'
description: Hamish used lockdown to master the piano, which helps him cope with the grief from the death of his mum.

title: Matt Doherty: Tottenham sign defender from Wolves
description: Tottenham Hotspur sign right-back Matt Doherty from Premier League rivals Wolverhampton Wanderers on a four-year deal.

title: Withington attack: Woman stabbed while walking with son
description: Police have issued images of a man they want to speak to and are treating it as attempted murder.

title: Accrington crash: Toddler hit after 'falling from car'
description: Police believe the girl fell from the rear door of the vehicle before being hit in the road.

title: Coronavirus: How lockdown 'robbed' us of grieving for mum
description: Jenny Wilson’s mum died just as the UK was going into lockdown.

title: Migrant rescue: UN urges help as 200 taken off Banksy rescue boat
description: Almost 400 migrants rescued by three ships in the Mediterranean must be allowed to disembark, it says.

title: Jurgen Klopp explains how job offer from Liverpool interrupted family holiday
description: Jurgen Klopp recalls how a family holiday in Lisbon in 2015 was interrupted by a phone call that resulted in him becoming Liverpool manager.

title: Watch: Millie Bright's Community Shield goal from every angle as Chelsea beat Man City
description: Watch Millie Bright's brilliant long-range opening goal from every angle in Chelsea's 2-0 victory over Manchester City in the FA Women's Community Shield at Wembley.

title: Coronavirus: PM's U-turns create a 'climate of uncertainty', says Conservative
description: It has become "increasingly difficult" for MPs to defend government policy, a senior Tory warns.
